channel.title: Best server? and other questions
channel.description:
Hi ive just started to get moparscape to work and know i may join someones server, but the question i have is what is the best server or what do use play on more?
Is there any servers with POHs and Hunting yet? or are they coming
Edit Also how do i get an item on my own server ive read the guide that you need to type ::item itemid howmany but every time i type it out including itemid it keeps saying "bad item"? Ive found out how to do this but still two more =)
Please help, and thanks guys :D

item.title: Best server? and other questions
item.dc:creator: @krixxor krixxor
item.description:
@krixxor wrote:

To spawn an item, type ::pickup itemid and number

For ex. :

::pickup 3140 1

In this case, the item id is 3140 = Dragon chain
The 1 shows how many Dragon chains i want…

Not so hard eh?

By the way, if you are using hybridscape server(lol), make sure you dont spawn more than 1 of an item that isn’t stackable, or else the client will lag. If you want to spawn more than one item, use the itemid for the same item, but as a note.

For ex. : 3141 1000

3141 is the item id for a noted d chain.
1000=amount

That wasn’t either so hard, or was it??

EDIT: by the way, closely all servers ar based on a older version of RS, so i don’t think hunting will ever come…

ANOTHER EDIT: to check servers, go to http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php

Read full topic
